page.title: 07LAW & ORDER POLICE
page.content: Nettleham has its own policeman P.C. Willows Chamberlain,whose one roomed office is attached to the police house on Scothern Lane. With him work P.C. Brian Cobb,and P.C.Tony Mawer. Their area,controlled from Gainsborough,covers Nettleham, Sudbrooke,Cherry Willingham,Reepham, Langworth,Fiskerton,Scothern, Holton-Cum-Beckering,Riseholme,Grange- de-Lings and Bullington.Since April 1985 the local policeman has,once again,become like the Old Beat Bobby. Now ,our policeman,like his colleges, attends Parish Council Meetings, visits schools and youth clubs,or sorts out particular problems on his patch,in fact his work is that of a local reassurance officer.His day is taken up by various crimes.There are two detective constables based at Market Rasen if needed.
